(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB just))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS hands))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJ new) (NNP Creative) (NNP Vado))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (VP (VBZ has)
                (ADVP (RB just))
                (VP (VBN been)
                  (VP (VBN released)
                    (PP (IN during)
                      (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (NN PC) (NN show)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(got-3, I-1)
advmod(got-3, just-2)
root(ROOT-0, got-3)
poss(hands-5, my-4)
dobj(got-3, hands-5)
prep(got-3, on-6)
det(Vado-10, the-7)
amod(Vado-10, new-8)
nn(Vado-10, Creative-9)
pobj(on-6, Vado-10)
nsubjpass(released-15, which-11)
aux(released-15, has-12)
advmod(released-15, just-13)
auxpass(released-15, been-14)
rcmod(Vado-10, released-15)
prep(released-15, during-16)
det(show-20, the-17)
amod(show-20, last-18)
nn(show-20, PC-19)
pobj(during-16, show-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB basically))
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (JJ small) (NN video) (NN camera))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (VBZ has)
              (NP
                (NP (DT an) (NN inbuilt) (CD 2) (NNP GB) (NN memory))
                (SBAR (IN that)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (VBZ allows)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP you))
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP
                            (VP (VB capture)
                              (NP (JJ video) (NNS clips)))
                            (CC and)
                            (VP (VB upload)
                              (NP (PRP it))
                              (PP (IN onto)
                                (NP (DT the) (NN web)))
                              (ADVP (RB instantly)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(camera-7, This-1)
cop(camera-7, is-2)
advmod(camera-7, basically-3)
det(camera-7, a-4)
amod(camera-7, small-5)
nn(camera-7, video-6)
root(ROOT-0, camera-7)
nsubj(has-9, which-8)
rcmod(camera-7, has-9)
det(memory-14, an-10)
nn(memory-14, inbuilt-11)
num(memory-14, 2-12)
nn(memory-14, GB-13)
dobj(has-9, memory-14)
mark(allows-17, that-15)
nsubj(allows-17, you-16)
dep(memory-14, allows-17)
nsubj(capture-20, you-18)
aux(capture-20, to-19)
xcomp(allows-17, capture-20)
amod(clips-22, video-21)
dobj(capture-20, clips-22)
cc(capture-20, and-23)
conj(capture-20, upload-24)
dobj(upload-24, it-25)
prep(upload-24, onto-26)
det(web-28, the-27)
pobj(onto-26, web-28)
advmod(upload-24, instantly-29)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (SBAR (IN as)
      (S
        (NP (PRP we))
        (VP (VBP get)
          (PP (IN into)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ thick))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (DT the) (NNP Durian) (NN season))))
            (, ,)))))))


root(ROOT-0, So-1)
mark(get-4, as-2)
nsubj(get-4, we-3)
dep(So-1, get-4)
prep(get-4, into-5)
det(thick-7, the-6)
pobj(into-5, thick-7)
prep(thick-7, of-8)
det(season-11, the-9)
nn(season-11, Durian-10)
pobj(of-8, season-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD thought)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (MD would)
            (VP (VB be)
              (ADJP (JJ interesting)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB film)
                      (NP (DT a) (JJ short) (NN tutorial))
                      (PP (IN on)
                        (SBAR
                          (WHADVP (WRB how))
                          (S
                            (VP (TO to)
                              (VP (VB choose)
                                (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN durian))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

xcomp(interesting-6, film-8)

dobj(choose-15, durian-18)

  (FRAG
    (PP (IN As)
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (JJ many) (NNS things))))
    (, ,)))

amod(things-4, many-3)
pobj(with-2, things-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBG choosing)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NNP Durian))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (VP (MD might)
              (VP (VB seem)
                (PP (IN like)
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ daunting) (NN task))))))))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP (JJ first)))
      (, ,))))

    (SBAR (IN once)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP know)
          (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (JJ simple) (NNS tips)))
        (, ,)))))

    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (MD can)
      (ADVP (RB really))
      (VP (VB help)

              (VP (VBN conned)))))))
    (. .)))

    (VP (VB do)
      (VP
        (VP (VB be)
          (ADJP (JJ patient)))
        (CC and)
        (VP (VB download)
          (NP (DT this)
            (ADJP (CD 5) (NN minute))
            (NN clip)))))
    (. .)))

            (SBAR

                    (NP (DT a) (JJ good) (NN durian))))))))))
    (. .)))

    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP hope)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))

              (NP (DT that))
              (ADJP (JJ useful)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB especially))
    (VP (VB appreciate)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN bit))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (NP (NNP Mr) (NNP Wong))
            (VP (VBD explained)
              (SBAR
                (SBAR (IN that)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP one))
                    (VP (VBZ has)
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB choose)
                            (NP
                              (NP
                                (NP (DT a) (NNP Durian))
                                (SBAR
                                  (WHNP (WDT that))
                                  (S
                                    (VP (VBZ is)
                                      (ADJP (JJ shapey))))))
                              (CONJP (RB rather) (IN than))
                              (NP (NN round)))))))))
                (CC and)
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB how))
                  (S
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ shapey) (NNS ones))
                    (VP (VBP give)
                      (NP (PRP you))
                      (NP
                        (NP (JJR thicker) (NN flesh))
                        (CC and)
                        (NP (JJR smaller) (NNS seeds))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(appreciate-3, I-1)
advmod(appreciate-3, especially-2)
root(ROOT-0, appreciate-3)
det(bit-5, the-4)
dobj(appreciate-3, bit-5)
advmod(explained-9, where-6)
nn(Wong-8, Mr-7)
nsubj(explained-9, Wong-8)
rcmod(bit-5, explained-9)
mark(has-12, that-10)
nsubj(has-12, one-11)
ccomp(explained-9, has-12)
aux(choose-14, to-13)
xcomp(has-12, choose-14)
det(Durian-16, a-15)
dobj(choose-14, Durian-16)
nsubj(shapey-19, that-17)
cop(shapey-19, is-18)
rcmod(Durian-16, shapey-19)
cc(Durian-16, rather-20)
mwe(rather-20, than-21)
conj(Durian-16, round-22)
cc(has-12, and-23)
advmod(give-28, how-24)
det(ones-27, the-25)
amod(ones-27, shapey-26)
nsubj(give-28, ones-27)
conj(has-12, give-28)
iobj(give-28, you-29)
amod(flesh-31, thicker-30)
dobj(give-28, flesh-31)
cc(flesh-31, and-32)
amod(seeds-34, smaller-33)
conj(flesh-31, seeds-34)


(ROOT
  (SQ (VBZ Does) (RB n't)
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (JJ deep) (JJ red) (NN color))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (JJ D13) (NN durian) (RB just))))
    (VP (VB make)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (ADJP (JJ drool))))
    (. ?)))


aux(make-12, Does-1)
neg(make-12, n't-2)
det(color-6, the-3)
amod(color-6, deep-4)
amod(color-6, red-5)
nsubj(make-12, color-6)
prep(color-6, of-7)
det(durian-10, the-8)
amod(durian-10, D13-9)
pobj(of-7, durian-10)
advmod(durian-10, just-11)
root(ROOT-0, make-12)
nsubj(drool-14, you-13)
xcomp(make-12, drool-14)

  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Oh))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (PRN (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP they))
      (VP (VBP ARE)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ good)
          (CC and)
          (JJ worth))
        (NP (DT the) (NN $))))))


cc(good-5, and-1)
nsubj(good-5, they-2)
cop(good-5, ARE-3)
advmod(good-5, very-4)
root(ROOT-0, good-5)
cc(good-5, and-6)
conj(good-5, worth-7)
det($-9, the-8)
attr(good-5, $-9)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (JJ 8\/kg) (NN price) (NN tag))
    (. !)))
